name: One-Arm Kettlebell Swings
description: Single-arm kettlebell swing using hip hinge to explosively drive kettlebell forward to shoulder height.
instructions: Place a kettlebell between your feet. Stand with your feet shoulder width apart, back straight, and shoulders back.
Squat down and grasp the kettlebell with one hand, keeping your arm extended. This will be your starting position.
Begin by swinging the kettlebell back between your legs, hinging at the hips and keeping your back straight.
Immediately reverse direction by explosively driving through your hips and knees, swinging the kettlebell forward to shoulder height with your arm extended.
Allow the kettlebell to swing back down between your legs as you hinge at the hips again. Maintain control throughout the movement.
Continue swinging for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.
